intro: Chorispora tianschanica, commonly known as the Tianshan chorispora, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Fabaceae. It is native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia, particularly the Tianshan range. The plant is characterized by its small, erect growth habit and trifoliate leaves. It produces small, yellowish-white flowers that bloom in late spring. Chorispora tianschanica is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments, often growing in rocky or sandy soils.
